description: Try our easy to follow Chimichurri Seafood Skewers With Mango & Lime Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Low saturated fat,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Dec 2019,Sesame free,High fibre,Christmas,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free,Pescatarian,Low salt,Egg free,Barramundi,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Peanut free
name: Chimichurri Seafood Skewers With Mango & Lime Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the chimichurri, reserve a few herbs then process all the ingredients, except peppers, in a food processor until finely chopped. Transfer 2/3 cup to a bowl and set aside. Add peppers to food processor with remaining paste and process until combined. Transfer to a separate bowl.

Reserve 1/4 cup green chimichurri and combine remainder with prawns in a bowl. Thread 4 prawns onto each of the 6 skewers. Reserve 1/4 cup red chimichurri and combine remainder with fish in a bowl. Thread onto 6 skewers.
Combine mango, onion and lime juice in a bowl. Chop reserved herbs and scatter over salsa.

Preheat a barbecue or chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Spray tortillas and skewers with oil. Cook tortillas for 2 minutes on each side or until toasted. Add prawn and fish skewers and cook for 4-5 minutes, turning halfway, or until cooked through.
Transfer skewers to a platter. Serve with mango salsa, tortillas, reserved red and green chimichurri, and extra lime.
